name: express-cocaine-service
description: Cocained service middleware wrapper for express
author: Vsevolod Strukchinsky <floatdrop@gmail.com>

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test/*-test.js test/*-tests.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
